text: Is it possible yet to do dynamic content in custom email modules? Like `if contact.firstname === 'jack', output 'you have a cool name'`

"Please note that using personalization variables (contact and company variables) within if statements is not currently supported for email in HubSpot. These variables can be used for logic on HubSpot CMS pages and blog templates." Source: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/if-statements>
We're actively working on this :+1: (have been for some time now, turns out it's a pretty tough problem to solve for Email)
We're expecting to have a beta for it in the first couple months of 2020
Interesting stuff guys. Thanks. <@U24DCSJBE> how can I stay informed on stuff like this. Could make a huge difference right now. Thanks.

Hi <@UL1S6TULB> the best place to subscribe for developer related changes we make to the HubSpot platform is our developer changelog. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog>

 We don’t announce beta’s there, but once functionality is considered stable we do post there.
